title: PROJECT-01 — Momentum vs Mean-Reversion
summary: Builds and compares momentum and mean-reversion strategies, including parameter sweeps and walk-forward validation.
impact: Teaches students how signal design affects risk/return.

title: PROJECT-02 — Portfolio Optimization with Efficient Frontier
summary: Modern Portfolio Theory with mean–variance, risk parity, and constraints; plots efficient frontier and allocation.
impact: Shows how diversification shapes drawdowns and Sharpe.

title: PROJECT-03 — Pairs Trading: Cointegration & Z-Score
summary: Tests pairs, checks cointegration, builds spread signals, and simulates entry/exit on z-score thresholds.
impact: Explains market-neutral ideas with low beta exposure.

title: PROJECT-04 — Options Volatility
summary: Estimates historical, implied, and realized vol; builds IV surface snapshots and skew/term structure visuals.
impact: Connects volatility to risk management and pricing.

title: PROJECT-05 — ML for Markets
summary: Feature engineering, cross-validation, and leakage control to predict returns; compares simple vs complex models.
impact: Teaches caution against overfitting and data snooping.

title: PROJECT-06 — Sharpe Ratio Optimization
summary: Maximizes Sharpe with realistic constraints; adds turnover and transaction costs to avoid over-trading.
impact: Shows the trade-off between returns and trading frictions.

title: PROJECT-07 — Monte Carlo Option Pricing
summary: Simulates geometric Brownian motion, prices European options, and analyzes convergence and variance reduction.
impact: Builds intuition for randomness and pricing accuracy.

title: PROJECT-08 — Value at Risk & Expected Shortfall
summary: Computes parametric and historical VaR/ES; stress tests tail scenarios and compares backtests.
impact: Highlights tail awareness and capital protection.

title: PROJECT-09 — CAPM Factor Models
summary: Runs CAPM & multi-factor regressions; interprets alpha/beta and residuals; compares sectors and time windows.
impact: Shows how factor exposure explains performance.

title: PROJECT-10 — Daily Returns & Volatility
summary: Calculates log returns, rolling stats, and volatility clustering; visualizes drawdowns and autocorrelation.
impact: Foundation for risk metrics and signal design.
